skyStriker:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

skyStriker:KagariPower.NAME: Kagari Effect 2
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains 1 ATK for each Spell in your DiscardPile

skyStriker:ShizukuPower.NAME: Shizuku Effect 2
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemy lose 1 ATK for each Spell in your DiscardPile

skyStriker:KainaPower.NAME: Kaina Effect 2
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you activate Sky Striker Spell Card, gain 1 HP

skyStriker:MultiRolePower.NAME: MultiRole
DESCRIPTIONS: Add Sky Striker Spells from your Discard Pile, up to the number of Sky Striker Spell Cards you activated this turn.They(It) [#ffff00]Exhaust[]

skyStriker:AreaZeroPower.NAME: AreaZero
DESCRIPTIONS: After Draw Phase,Discard 1, excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck add 1 excavated Sky Striker card to your hand

skyStriker:HayatePower.NAME: Hayate
DESCRIPTIONS: Ignore Enemy's Block.After attacking send 1 Sky Striker card from your Deck to the Discard Pile

skyStriker:ChickenGamePower.NAME: ChickenGame
DESCRIPTIONS: Every turn you lose 3 HP and draw 1 card
